text: Teramo may refer to: Places: * Teramo, a city in central Italy Names: * Teramo Piaggio, Italian painter of the late-Renaissance * Jacobus de Teramo (1349-1417), medieval canon lawyer and bishop * Zacara da Teramo (1350 to 1360 – 1416), medieval composer, singer and papal secretary Sports: * Teramo Basket, an Italian basketball club * Teramo Calcio, an Italian football club Other: * Teramo, a sports car in Driver: Parallel Lines.
title: Teramo (disambiguation)
